description: Enterprise techniques used by The White Company, ATT&CK group G0089 v1.0
name: The White Company (G0089)

techniques.comment: [The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has sent phishing emails with malicious Microsoft Word attachments to victims.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has used phishing lure documents that trick users into opening them and infecting their computers.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has taken advantage of a known vulnerability in Microsoft Word (CVE 2012-0158) to execute code.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has obfuscated their payloads through packing.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has performed anti-analysis checks to determine if its malware was in a debugging environment.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has the ability to delete its malware entirely from the target system.

[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has checked for specific antivirus products on the target’s computer, including Kaspersky, Quick Heal, AVG, BitDefender, Avira, Sophos, Avast!, and ESET.
[The White Company](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0089) has checked the current date on the victim system.
